title: Backgrounds
content: of My Deeds Was Greatly Exaggerated Rig the Baldur's Mouth printing press. Woman of Her Word Side with the Nine-Fingers against the Zhentarim. Protector of the Duke Noble Rescue Counsellor Florrick from the burning inn. Lest Ye Be Judged Learn Astarion's history as a magistrate. Noblesse Oblige Dismiss a companion for interrupting a conversation. Soul For Sale Acquire a Soul Coin for your personal collection. Blueblood Solidarity Learn Wyll's family history. Bodyguards For Hire Recruit the ogre
